channel.title: Can you make Npc's fight back?
channel.description: On a Czar source? I think it's really dumb that they don't fight back and I'd find it extremely helpful if there was a tutorial on how to make them fight back or something like that. Thanks

item.title: Can you make Npc's fight back?
item.dc:creator: @kaelen92 kaelen92
item.description:
@kaelen92 wrote:

lmao nice cat s 3 3 m 3 but it’s spam…

[quote=“pking nubs3, post:2, topic:200200”]On Czar, The npcs don’t attack back as long as there are 2 people on.
If your the only one on that is the reason why.
-Bomb.[/quote]
I always have more than 10 people on my server so that can’t be right.

Read full topic
item.source: Can you make Npc's fight back?

item.title: Can you make Npc's fight back?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Use different source. Problem solved.

Read full topic
